lead_paragraph: After one race in the 2010 Formula One season, the preliminary verdict is in: Michael Schumacher has the stamina and the craft, but does he still have enough natural speed to fight for an eighth world title?
snippet: After one race in the 2010 Formula One season, the preliminary verdict is in: Michael Schumacher has the stamina and the craft, but does he still have enough natural speed to fight for an eighth world title?
